Application.Repository

Interface ScenarioRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Scenario,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Scenario,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Scenario,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Scenario>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Scenario,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface ScenarioRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Scenario,java.lang.Integer>
    An interface to manage the data access to the Scenario table.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the list of Scenario(s) for which there is not an associated Scenario in another language.

    • Method Detail

      • findByLanguage

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM scenario WHERE lang = :lang AND deleted = 0",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Collection<Scenario> findByLanguage(@Param(value="lang")
                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String lang)
        Returns the list of Scenario(s) with the provided language.
        Parameters:
        lang - The language of the Scenario.
        Returns:
        The list of Scenario(s) with the provided language.

      • findByLanguageAndUser

        @Query(value="SELECT s.* FROM scenario as s JOIN referral_code_scenario as rcs on s.id_scenario = rcs.scenario WHERE s.lang = :lang AND rcs.released = 1 AND s.deleted = 0 AND rcs.referral_code IN (SELECT referral_code FROM referral_code as rc JOIN user as u ON rc.id_referral_code = u.referral_code WHERE cookie = :id_user AND rc.value = :refCode) UNION SELECT s1.* FROM scenario as s1 JOIN referral_code_scenario as rcs1 on s1.id_scenario = rcs1.scenario WHERE s1.lang = :lang AND s1.deleted = 0 AND rcs1.released = 1 AND rcs1.referral_code IN (SELECT id_referral_code FROM referral_code as rc WHERE rc.value = \"universal\")",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Collection<Scenario> findByLanguageAndUser(@Param(value="lang")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String lang,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @Param(value="id_user")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String id_user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @Param(value="refCode")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String refCode)
        Returns the list of Scenario(s) the User is allowed to visualize.
        Parameters:
        lang - The language associated with the Scenario.
        id_user - The unique identifier of the User.
        refCode - The referral code associated with the Scenario.
        Returns:
        The list of Scenario(s) the User is allowed to visualize.

      • findLastScenarioGroup

        @Query(value="SELECT scenario_group FROM scenario ORDER BY scenario_group DESC LIMIT 1",
       nativeQuery=true)
int findLastScenarioGroup()
        Returns the last group number among the Scenario(s).
        Returns:
        The last group number among the Scenario(s).

      • findByScenarioGroup

        @Query(value="SELECT quiz FROM scenario WHERE scenario_group = :scenarioGroup",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Optional<Quiz> findByScenarioGroup(@Param(value="scenarioGroup")
                                                                                                                                                      int scenarioGroup)
        Returns the Quiz associated with the Scenario with the provided group number.
        Parameters:
        scenarioGroup - The number representing the group of the Scenario.
        Returns:
        If found, the Quiz associated with the Scenario with the provided group number, null otherwise.

      • findAllWithoutScenarioGroup

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM scenario WHERE scenario_group NOT IN (SELECT scenario_group FROM scenario GROUP BY scenario_group HAVING count(*) > 1) AND id_narrative IN (SELECT id_narrative FROM narrative WHERE name = :narrativeName AND lang != :narrativeLang)",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Collection<Scenario> findAllWithoutScenarioGroup(@Param(value="narrativeName")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String narrativeName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         @Param(value="narrativeLang")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String narrativeLang)
        Returns the list of Scenario(s) for which there is not an associated Scenario in another language.
        Parameters:
        narrativeName - The name of the Narrative
        narrativeLang - The language of the Narrative
        Returns:
        The list of Scenario(s) for which there is not an associated Scenario in another language.

      • findDeletedById

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM scenario WHERE id_scenario = :id AND deleted = 1",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Optional<Scenario> findDeletedById(@Param(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                     int deletedScenarioId)
        Returns the deleted Scenario with the provided unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        deletedScenarioId - The unique identifier of the Scenario.
        Returns:
        If found, the deleted Scenario with the provided unique identifier, null otherwise.
